import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' import axios from "axios"; function ProductScreen({ match }) { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function fetchProduct() { const { data } = await axios.get('/api/products/${match.params.id') setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() },[]) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out fo Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
